items.sentence: I'm afraid I'll have to disappoint you. I don't feel like participating in this discussion.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t talk to each other then because they didn\'t speak a common language.
After I graduated from college, I moved back home and lived with my parents for three years.
Mary is really great. She cooked a wonderful meal for me and even washed the dishes herself.
I don\'t know how to play the clarinet very well, but I\'m pretty good at playing the flute.
Tom thought the music was too loud, but he was too tired to get up and turn the volume down.
Tom thought where he put his gold coins was the perfect hiding place. However, he was wrong.
Tom doesn\'t like Mary. However, she doesn\'t particularly care whether he likes her or not.
Most people who hear Tom speaking French would never guess that he wasn\'t a native speaker.
Tom lost the shopping list his mother had given him and just bought things he wanted to eat.
